title: Custom buttons and actions on call screen
body:
Ability to add a custom buttons to system call app, like in screenshots
http://bit.ly/incomingScreen
http://bit.ly/incallScreen
click on button will launch some callback which will access to:
1. Access to call voice stream in/out
2. Access to call controls, can initiate a new call, end exists, etc, all features provided by standard buttons on call page
